price: 18. En verdad, (Muhammad) contempló algunas de las mayores pruebas (de la grandeza) de su Señor.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
